uk.ac.diamond.powder_toolkit.dataAnalysis

Class Comparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.diamond.powder_toolkit.dataAnalysis.Comparator

  • public class Comparator
extends java.lang.Object
    Comparator is a class designed to compare arrays, it is a conversion from an original python script and its main use should be the comparison of large datasets eg Intensity's
    Author:
    sfz19839
